title: President Zardari condoles over death of Asfandyar Wali’s wife
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 11 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari on Monday expressed condolence over the death of Awami National Party leader Asfandyar Wali’s wife.
“My sympathies and prayers go to the bereaved family,” the president said, according to a President House press release.
He prayed to Allah Almighty to grant peace to the departed soul and patience to the grieved family members to bear the loss with fortitude.
